info.title: simcore-service-director-v2
info.description: Orchestrates the pipeline of services defined by the user

servers.description: Default server: requests directed to serving url
Development server: can configure any base url

get.description: Lists services available in the deployed registry

parameters.description:
The service type:
   - computational - a computational service
   - interactive - an interactive service

schema.description:
The service type:
   - computational - a computational service
   - interactive - an interactive service

parameters.name: service_type

parameters.description: Distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

schema.title: Service Key
schema.description: Distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

parameters.name: service_key

get.description: Returns details of the selected service if available in the platform

parameters.description: Distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

schema.title: Service Key
schema.description: Distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

parameters.name: service_key

parameters.description: The ID of the user that starts the service

schema.description: The ID of the user that starts the service

parameters.description: The ID of the project in which the service starts

schema.description: The ID of the project in which the service starts

parameters.name: project_id

post.summary: Create and optionally start a new computation

get.summary: Gets computation task logs file after is done
get.description:
Returns download links to log-files of each task in a computation.
Each log is only available when the corresponding task is done

schema.title: Response Get All Tasks Log Files V2 Computations  Project Id  Tasks   Logfile Get

get.summary: Gets computation task logs file after is done
get.description:
Returns a link to download logs file of a give task.
The log is only available when the task is done

get.summary: returns a list of running interactive services filtered by user_id and/or project_idboth legacy (director-v0) and modern (director-v2)

schema.title: Response List Tracked Dynamic Services V2 Dynamic Services Get

get.summary: assembles the status for the dynamic-sidecar

post.summary: Calls the dynamic service's retrieve endpoint with optional port_keys
Calls the dynamic service's restart containers endpoint

patch.summary: Updates the project networks according to the current project's workbench

schema.title: Response List Clusters V2 Clusters Get

post.summary: Create a new cluster for a user

schema.title: Response Delete Service Containers V2 Dynamic Scheduler Services  Node Uuid  Containers Delete

409.description: Task already running, cannot start a new one

post.summary: Starts the saving of the state for the service

schema.title: Response Save Service State V2 Dynamic Scheduler Services  Node Uuid  State Save Post

409.description: Task already running, cannot start a new one

post.summary: Starts the pushing of the outputs for the service

schema.title: Response Push Service Outputs V2 Dynamic Scheduler Services  Node Uuid  Outputs Push Post

409.description: Task already running, cannot start a new one

delete.summary: Removes the service's sidecar, proxy and docker networks & volumes

schema.title: Response Delete Service Docker Resources V2 Dynamic Scheduler Services  Node Uuid  Docker Resources Delete

409.description: Task already running, cannot start a new one

read.title: Read
read.description: allows to run pipelines on that cluster

name.title: Name
name.description: The human readable name of the cluster

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: url to the image describing this cluster

scheduler.title: Scheduler
scheduler.description: This contains dask scheduler information given by the underlying dask library

name.title: Name
name.description: The human readable name of the cluster

thumbnail.title: Thumbnail
thumbnail.description: url to the image describing this cluster

start_pipeline.title: Start Pipeline
start_pipeline.description: if True the computation pipeline will start right away

subgraph.title: Subgraph
subgraph.description: An optional set of nodes that must be executed, if empty the whole pipeline is executed

force_restart.title: Force Restart
force_restart.description: if True will force re-running all dependent nodes

cluster_id.title: Cluster Id
cluster_id.description: the computation shall use the cluster described by its id, 0 is the default cluster

force.title: Force
force.description: if True then the pipeline will be removed even if it is running

id.title: Id
id.description: the id of the computation task

state.description: the state of the computational task

result.title: Result
result.description: the result of the computational task

pipeline_details.title: Pipeline Details
pipeline_details.description: the details of the generated pipeline

iteration.title: Iteration
iteration.description: the iteration id of the computation task (none if no task ran yet)

cluster_id.title: Cluster Id
cluster_id.description: the cluster on which the computaional task runs/ran (none if no task ran yet)

started.title: Started
started.description: the timestamp when the computation was started or None if not started yet

stopped.title: Stopped
stopped.description: the timestamp when the computation was stopped or None if not started nor stopped yet

submitted.title: Submitted
submitted.description: task last modification timestamp or None if the there is no task

url.title: Url
url.description: the link where to get the status of the task

stop_url.title: Stop Url
stop_url.description: the link where to stop the task

ContainerSpec.title: ContainerSpec

Command.title: Command
Command.description: Used to override the container's command

ContainerSpec.description:
Implements entries that can be overriden for https://docs.docker.com/engine/api/v1.41/#operation/ServiceCreate
request body: TaskTemplate -> ContainerSpec

service_key.title: Service Key
service_key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

service_version.title: Service Version
service_version.description: semantic version number of the node

service_basepath.title: Service Basepath
service_basepath.description: predefined path where the dynamic service should be served. If empty, the service shall use the root endpoint.

can_save.title: Can Save
can_save.description: the service data must be saved when closing

image.title: Image
image.description: Used by the frontend to provide a context for the users.Services with a docker-compose spec will have multiple entries.Using the `image:version` instead of the docker-compose spec is more helpful for the end user.

boot_modes.description: describe how a service shall be booted, using CPU, MPI, openMP or GPU

released.title: Released
released.description: Maps every route's path tag with a released version

CPU.title: Cpu
CPU.description: defines the required (maximum) CPU shares for running the services

GPU.title: Gpu
GPU.description: defines the required (maximum) GPU for running the services

RAM.title: Ram
RAM.description: defines the required (maximum) amount of RAM for running the services

VRAM.title: Vram
VRAM.description: defines the required (maximum) amount of VRAM for running the services

modified.title: Modified
modified.description: true if the node's outputs need to be re-computed

dependencies.title: Dependencies
dependencies.description: contains the node inputs dependencies if they need to be computed first

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: current progress of the task if available (None if not started or not a computational task)

adjacency_list.title: Adjacency List
adjacency_list.description: The adjacency list of the current pipeline in terms of {NodeID: [successor NodeID]}

progress.title: Progress
progress.description: the progress of the pipeline (None if there are no computational tasks)

node_states.title: Node States
node_states.description: The states of each of the computational nodes in the pipeline

port_keys.title: Port Keys
port_keys.description: The port keys to retrieve data from

size_bytes.title: Size Bytes
size_bytes.description: The amount of data transferred by the retrieve call

service_key.title: Service Key
service_key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

service_version.title: Service Version
service_version.description: semantic version number of the node

service_basepath.title: Service Basepath
service_basepath.description: predefined path where the dynamic service should be served. If empty, the service shall use the root endpoint.

boot_type.description: Describes how the dynamic services was started (legacy=V0, modern=V2).Since legacy services do not have this label it defaults to V0.

service_host.title: Service Host
service_host.description: the service swarm internal host name

published_port.title: Published Port
published_port.description: the service swarm published port if any

entry_point.title: Entry Point
entry_point.description: if empty the service entrypoint is on the root endpoint.

service_message.title: Service Message
service_message.description: additional information related to service state

published_port.title: Published Port
published_port.description: The ports where the service provides its interface on the docker swarm

entry_point.title: Entry Point
entry_point.description: The entry point where the service provides its interface

service_uuid.title: Service Uuid
service_uuid.description: The node UUID attached to the service

service_key.title: Service Key
service_key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

service_host.title: Service Host
service_host.description: service host name within the network

service_port.title: Service Port
service_port.description: port to access the service within the network

service_basepath.title: Service Basepath
service_basepath.description: the service base entrypoint where the service serves its contents

service_state.description: the service state * 'pending' - The service is waiting for resources to start * 'pulling' - The service is being pulled from the registry * 'starting' - The service is starting * 'running' - The service is running * 'complete' - The service completed * 'failed' - The service failed to start * 'stopping' - The service is stopping

RunningState.title: RunningState
RunningState.description:
State of execution of a project's computational workflow

SEE StateType for task state

status.title: Status
status.description: The running status of the scheduler

ServiceDockerData.title: ServiceDockerData

name.title: Name
name.description: short, human readable name for the node

description.title: Description
description.description: human readable description of the purpose of the node

key.title: Key
key.description: distinctive name for the node based on the docker registry path

contact.title: Contact
contact.description: email to correspond to the authors about the node

inputs.title: Inputs
inputs.description: definition of the inputs of this node

outputs.title: Outputs
outputs.description: definition of the outputs of this node

boot-options.title: Boot-Options
boot-options.description: Service defined boot options. These get injected in the service as env variables.

min-visible-inputs.title: Min-Visible-Inputs
min-visible-inputs.description: The number of 'data type inputs' displayed by default in the UI. When None all 'data type inputs' are displayed.

ServiceDockerData.description:
Static metadata for a service injected in the image labels

This is one to one with node-meta-v0.0.1.json

ServiceInput.title: ServiceInput

displayOrder.title: Displayorder
displayOrder.description: DEPRECATED: new display order is taken from the item position. This will be removed.

type.title: Type
type.description: data type expected on this input glob matching for data type is allowed

contentSchema.title: Contentschema
contentSchema.description: jsonschema of this input/output. Required when type='ref_contentSchema'

fileToKeyMap.title: Filetokeymap
fileToKeyMap.description: Place the data associated with the named keys in files

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Units, when it refers to a physical quantity

widget.title: Widget
widget.description: custom widget to use instead of the default one determined from the data-type

ServiceInput.description: Metadata on a service input port

displayOrder.title: Displayorder
displayOrder.description: DEPRECATED: new display order is taken from the item position. This will be removed.

type.title: Type
type.description: data type expected on this input glob matching for data type is allowed

contentSchema.title: Contentschema
contentSchema.description: jsonschema of this input/output. Required when type='ref_contentSchema'

fileToKeyMap.title: Filetokeymap
fileToKeyMap.description: Place the data associated with the named keys in files

unit.title: Unit
unit.description: Units, when it refers to a physical quantity

widget.title: Widget
widget.description: custom widget to use instead of the default one determined from the data-type

download_link.title: Download Link
download_link.description: Presigned link for log file or None if still not available
